name: OneminutemeditationRelaxingquickmeditation
0:
”Alexa, open one minute meditation”
”Alexa, launch one minute meditation”
”Alexa, ask one minute meditation to guided meditation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: one minute meditation
des:
A minute is all it takes to bring ourselves back to our natural state of inner peace and well-being. Learn to relax, refocus and re-energise in just one minute with meditations. It is about becoming a powerful positive force in your own life. Many of us struggle to find even 1 minute of peace in our day, and this skill is for you.

Practicing mindfulness improves both mental and physical health. Mindfulness involves both concentration (a form of meditation) and acceptance. Many people struggle with how to begin meditating and get the rewards of more contemplative life, so this skill is the perfect way to start a meditation practice. You can change your life, and change the world... one minute at a time.

Feeling frazzled ?? Nature can support you in settling down. The sounds of nature set a serene atmosphere for meditation, helping to quiet a busy mind and aid relaxation. You have to try it to believe it - just one moment of meditation can make a big difference.

There are several different meditations available. You can ask for a specific meditation or you can ask Alexa to select random. Each of these one-minute meditations will play a related meditative soundtrack to help you tune out the world and focus on your breath.

Here is the list of the meditative soundtrack:

THUNDERSTORM
APPROACHING STORM
SINGING BOWL
BIRD CHIRPING
WIND CHIMES
RAIN
FLOWING WATER
MAGIC FOREST
OCEAN WAVES
RAINFOREST
RELAXATION
ZEN STONES
LULLABY

***#***#***#***#***#***#***#***#***#***

Hope you like the skill and SOUNDMIX feature. Your feedback encourages us to put more time and effort into skill development. 
Your candid reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills. Please leave your valuable review on skill store page.

Note: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
